Visit our bakery
Our Story

A sanctuary within the city

Discover this delightful bakery nestled in the heart of Bình Tân District in Saigon. Established in 2015, this sweet haven is the dream-turned-reality of two talented sisters with a passion for baking. After honing their craft as bakers in France for five years, they returned to their roots with a vision to offer a sustainable and delightful experience.

As you step inside, warm ambiance and irresistible aroma create a truly enchanting experience. From special celebrations to everyday indulgences, Ma Chérie Cupcake Factory offers a taste of elegance that leaves a lasting impression on both hearts and taste buds.

Our flavors rotate throughout the year

"18 Carat" Cupcake

35k

Made with grated organic carrots, pineapple, walnuts & spice. Our favorite carrot cake ... ever!

7 Up Cupcake

30k

Uplifting organic lemon and lime juice flavor this cake and the cream cheese frosting. Our 7 Up cupcake has a loyal following!

( Available March through September )

White Chocolate Peppermint Cupcake

40k

We nestle crushed candies and white chocolate into our batter, then frost with white chocolate buttercream! So fun!

( Available October through December )

All Chocolate Cupcake

30k

Really makes me think of a cake mix cake ... for all the right reasons! (But its not - we make it from scratch just like all of our other cakes and use melted Guittard chocolate chips! ) It is fluffy, yet rich, has a tender crumb and just begs for a glass of cold milk to drink along with it!

Caramel Apple Cupcake

30k

Apple cupcakes with caramel cream cheese frosting!

( Available October through January )

Brown Sugar Caramel Cupcake

35k

A fall favorite! Caramel cream cheese frosting atop tender little cupcakes with just a pinch of brown sugar on top!

( Available October through January )

Chocolate Cupcake with Vanilla Buttercream

35k

All Chocolate cupcakes with vanilla buttercream frosting.

Chocolate Mousse filled Artisan Cupcake with Strawberry Cream Cheese Icing

50k

All Chocolate cupcake filled with chocolate mousse and topped with strawberry cream cheese icing. Garnished with chocolate curls.

( Available only in February )

Dreamsicle Cupcake

30k

Pure, organic orange extract flavors our cream cheese cupcake which is then topped with cream cheese icing and grated white chocolate.

( Available March through September )

Seasonal Decorated Cupcakes

40k

Price may vary with seasonal decoration.

Classic Chocolate Cupcake

35k

The perennial kids' favorite cake! Butter cupcake with chocolate icing. Pure and simple.

Key Lime Curd Pot

40k

Our cream cheese cupcakes filled with freshly cooked homemade key lime curd! Cream cheese frosting and organic lime zest atop!

( Available March through September )

Lemon Curd Pot

40k

Cream cheese cupcakes filled with our freshly cooked organic lemon curd. Iced with cream cheese frosting and a bit of zest on top!

Mocha Buttercream Cupcake

35k

The perfect combination of coffee and chocolate in a cake! Features organic unbleached flour, buttermilk, melted chocolate chips, organic espresso and pure vanilla.

Oreo Buttercream Cupcake

35k

Something for the kid in all of us! Chocolate cake made with Guittard Chocolate, enrobed in a chocolate cream cookie buttercream icing!

Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Cupcake

35k

A real shop favorite! Inspired by Spring Garden's pumpkin chocolate chip muffins. Iced with cream cheese.

Raspberry Lady Pot Artisan Cupcake

30k

Cream cheese cupcakes filled with raspberry jam and iced in a light raspberry jam/cream cheese blend!

Red Velvet Cupcake

35k

Classic red velvet with an extra dose of cocoa! Iced with cream cheese frosting and a few chocolate shavings.

S'mores Artisan Cupcake

50k

We make a graham cracker crust, tuck marshmallow filling into our chocolate cupcake, then ice it with a marshmallow buttercream and dip it in our chocolate ganache with mini vegan marshmallows on top! Just too Good!

( Available October through March )

40k

Freshly sliced berries fill the inside of this cream cheese cupcake which is topped with vanilla buttercream.

Classic Vanilla Cupcake

30k

Pure and simple. Vanilla buttercream on our tender cream cheese cupcakes.
